Author: Crabby Paddy#6239
Content:
Zaddex exchange is live! 
https://zaddex.io

For those looking for another platform to trade on / digitalprice alternative, Zaddex will have KMD as a base pairing and will also be listing ARRR as a base pairing in the coming week. The next coins coming will be VRSC, Chips, Labs and other komodo ecosystem coins.

Other features to be introduced in the near future include Fiat gateway, Z deposits/withdrawals, Trading competition, Government VC investments, Margin trading etc.

Please help support a komodo ecosystem project and put up some orders, or simply pop by and take a look 😄

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
```jl777cToday at 12:15 AM
libnspv html wallet is now localizable into different languages. we just need a file in the same format at ~/libnspv/html/languages/english.json
we need at least the following languages: 
french, 
italian, 
chinese, 
chinese simplified, 
japanese, 
korean, 
russian 
and spanish.
those are the languages with seed words. however, the html can support basically any language, just need the language.json file```

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
help translate nSPV to other languages please:
https://github.com/jl777/libnspv/tree/jl777/html/languages
as many as possible

Author: barv#0867
Content:
As most open source projects are ownerless and have no legal entity it can limit it’s options (App Store) or cause unwanted liabilities for developers (EtherDelta).  

To solve this we created the *Autonomous Software Foundation*. This (Dutch) non-profit acts as a publishing agent for projects facing these challenges.

So far we published Komodo ecosystem project *CoinCollect* (public beta wallet), the Grin community project *Ironbelly* (wallet) and we like to add many, many more.

We think open source and free software betters the world and deserves to have at least the same opportunities as their closed source cousins. 

Feel free to reach out to us (dm me) if you feel we can help a project you are working on and are passionate about. https://autonomoussoftware.org/we-can-help/

Author: Ludom#5832
Content:
Hi some annoucements about the Komodo meetup :
First of all you have to subscribe for the Meetup and the Ludom's BBQ (free, sponsored by IndéNodes and @metaphilibert ) and for the collective accommodation (not obligatory). 
https://www.weezevent.com/komodo-meetup-weekend
Si tu es francophone ou que tu parles parfaitement français, tu peux aussi t'inscrire au Repas du coin du dimanche : https://framadate.org/lisbonne
I have some promotion codes for the free accommodation (sponsored by Starchain). It makes the shared rooms free. PM me if interested.
